title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Tuesday 26 September 2017 - BBC News
summary: man arrested in fleckney murder probe .
lorry driver injured in nottingham crash .
lester 'set to leave forest for spireites return ' .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it for regular updates us for today , we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel for the east midlands .
updates on breaking news will continue throughout the night .

documents.title: weather : dry , but with mist and fog around
text: it will stay dry overnight with variable amounts of cloud .
where clear spells develop , the odd mist or fog patch will form .
minimum temperatures of 12c ( 54f ) .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: new assembly rooms 'looks awful '
text: here are a few more facebook comments on the proposed £ 32m assembly rooms replacement .
`` looks awful , does n't fit in with the rest of the old buildings .
why do n't they design something what dose .
but still at least something is being done i suppose , '' opined andrew webb .
`` anyone would think an election is due , '' adds weary cynic paul burge .
join the debate here .
author: Facebook

documents.title: rugby : leicester tigers injury update
text: leicester tigers boss matt o'connor has said graham kitchener 's surgery on a cracked eye socket went better than expected .
kitchener ( who up the injury in the defeat against northampton saints , is expected to be back in time for the start of tigers ' champions cup campaign next month .
in other injury news , brendon o'connor and adam thompstone could be available to face exeter on saturday , but the trip to reading to face london irish a week later looks a more likely return date .
hooker george mcguigan is back in training , but no date has been set for his return .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: man stabbed in neck in calverton
text: two 16-year-old boys have been questioned after a man was stabbed in the neck during an attempted robbery .
police said three 18-year-olds were allegedly targeted in main street in calverton at about 23:00 on friday 15 september .
the two boys were arrested on sus of attempted robbery and have been released while investigations continue .
details of the attack have only just been made public .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ex-cop calls for greater scrutiny of taser usage
text: a former leicestershire police officer is calling for `` greater transparency '' over the use of tasers .
the force currently has 80 officers carrying tasers and is planning to increase the number up to 150 .
nick glynn , who spent 30 years with the force , believes as the number of officers with taser training increases , the greater the scrutiny should be .

mr glynn said : `` as the roll out of this equipment increases , so should the scrutiny and oversight , not only inside leicestershire police but also externally from independent people to have some transparency . ''
author: BBC Radio Leicester

documents.title: man fined for wearing military uniform
text: man fined for wearing military uniform

documents.title: man fined for wearing military uniform without permission
text: a derby man has been fined £ 500 after pleading guilty to wearing a military uniform without permission while fundraising .
christopher webster , 43 , donned the outfit in staffordshire while asking the public for donations for shoebox for heroes , a non-charity organisation that sent packages to troops serving abroad .
mr webster , of sunny grove in chaddesden , pleaded guilty to contravening section 2 of the uniforms act 1894 , which puts restrictions on who can wear military uniform .
he told magistrates he had not meant to upset anyone by wearing the outfit and had done so `` to show his respect for fallen heroes '' .
the district judge said : `` i have a very uneasy feeling about [ webster 's ] activities and about the way that this organisation has been set up . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: date set for leicester-leeds cup tie
text: a note for your diaries foxes fans
# carabaocup : round four dates and kick-off times for next month 's ties have been confirmed .
what a surprise sky sports utd show the swansea vs utd dull fest
i genuinely cant remember the last time a man utd cup game wasnt shown , its pathetic .
surprise surprise man u on tv
5 prem teams v champ sides , but decide to show utd again !
pathetic .

what a surprise

surprise surprise the same teams are shown on tv
@ twitterid @ twitterid
looking forward to displaying our 3d camcarpets at king power stadium # carabaocup # leicestercity
shame it 's not on telly hopefully i 'll be off on that day tho
its a shocker man utd are on tv again
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your comments : plans revealed for new derby music venue
text: those plans for a music and comedy venue ( see 15:10 ) to replace the assembly rooms in derby have sparked plenty of debate on facebook .
barbara beer writes : `` sounds good to me , it 's about time derby had something like this again to attract big artists to our city , instead of having to travel to other places to see them x ''
but helena roper adds : `` not sure we need a new assembly rooms , the velodrome and quad seem to be coping with the entertainment . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: watch : mp says labour offers 'clear ' brexit plans
text: labour mp john mann has said that jeremy corbyn would get the uk out of the european union much quicker than theresa may and the conservatives .

in an interview with the bbc 's daily politics at the labour conference in brighton , mr mann , the mp for bassetlaw , added that his party had been `` much clearer '' on brexit than the conservatives .
the conservative party conference starts on sunday in manchester .
author: The Daily Politics

documents.title: county ins & outs 2017
text: county ins & outs 2017

documents.title: council reveals £ 32m venue to replace derby assembly rooms
text: derby 's assembly rooms are set to be replaced by this - a live music and comedy venue costing £ 32m .
a report outlines how `` cultural compromises '' have had to be made to make the finances work .
it wo n't have specialist theatre facilities .
the assembly rooms , which had previously staged live music and events like the british open snooker , closed following a fire in 2014 .
author: Chris Doidge
BBC Radio Derby political reporter

documents.title: concerns over missing derbyshire man
text: police say they 're growing concerned for the safety of a 50-year-old derbyshire man who 's gone missing .
paul andrews was last seen in clay cross at about 07:00 .
derbyshire police have asked the public to look out for a red mazda car with the registration pk54 mzj .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: new leicestershire ambulance service promises improvement
text: the new provider of non-emergency patient transport in leicestershire will meet local people tonight to assure them the service will improve after it takes charge .
the current service - arriva transport solutions - has faced regular criticism about delays getting patients to and from hospital .
thames ambulance service limited will start a five-year contract in october .
author: East Midlands Today

documents.title: watch : england director strauss on stokes and hales
text: nottinghamshire 's alex hales is helping police with their enquiries after his england team-mate ben stokes was arrested on sus of causing actual bodily harm at a nightclub in bristol .
here 's what andrew strauss has had to say on the incident involving ben stokes and alex hales
cop out regarding ashes selection .
what sort of role models are they ?
perhaps the sort who are presumed innocent until proven guilty ?
why the decision not to play them now then ?
if innocent , which i hope they are , they should be up for selection .
because game is wednesday .
night in cells & hales back to bristol to 'help police ' with enquiries would , i expect , rather affect preparation
night in cells , for whatever reason , does not equal good role model .
my kids ' idols should n't end up there .
my opinion and i respect yours .
say you were attacked in street , you defended yourself and due to allegation/counter-allegation you ended up in cells .
how should 1/2
sadly got to go to a meeting now - would love to continue this .
perhaps strauss could have said ashes dependent on form and outcome of enq ?
how can they be considered for the ashes ?
if found guilty of anything in all honesty they ca n't
stokes is the vice captain
so what he has n't been charged with anything
and let 's hope he is n't
he wo n't be the first or last sportsman in a bit of bother if he is

stop press : jamie davey and alex miller agree with one another on something !
( depending on what it is he has/has n't done of course ! )
i do n't really care if he 's chinned someone , nothing to do with cricket , no doubt some idiot had a pop cos of who he is , seen it all before
form and fitness as they normally would apart from pietersen of course .
no tie from strauss ?
disgraceful .
maybe stokes will want to change sports along with ferdinand .
grow a pair of testes and stand up for your man .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : bird full of song
text: wonder what song this robin 's singing ?
thanks to maggie t in east leake for the photo .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: police continue appeal over fleckney 'murder '
text: following the man 's arrest on sus of murder ( see 13:13 ) , leicestershire police has said it will not be making any further comment as the case is now active .
the force added that it still wanted to hear from people who may have information about the death , who have not yet come forward .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man charged over east midlands burglary spree
text: a nottingham man has been charged with carrying out 10 burglaries across the east midlands in the first six months of this year .
one of the burglaries allegedly involved violence .
he 's also been charged with four counts of handling stolen goods and one theft .
the 27-year-old has been remanded in custody to appear at nottingham crown court on 20 october .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingman arrested in fleckney murder probe
text: police have arrested a man in connection with the murder of a woman in fleckney , near market harborough .
the 25-year-old is being held in police custody and will be interviewed in the next few hours .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingalex hales 'helping police with inquiries '

documents.title: football : musa gets nigeria call up despite lack of game time
text: leicester city forward ahmed musa has been called up for nigeria 's crucial world cup qualifier against zambia next month .
there had been calls for boss gernot rohr to drop the 24-year-old because he has not featured for the foxes in the league this season .
but the super eagles boss said musa 's call up was based on current form and game time .
author: AFP

documents.title: amputee teen racer set for charity walk
text: amputee teen racer set for charity walk

documents.title: labour 'needs to find election candidates early '
text: labour should install general election candidates as soon as possible in seats that they are targeting , a nottingham city councillor has said .

the party are said to be looking at overturning conservative majorities in a number of seats across nottinghamshire , including broxtowe ( 863 majority ) , sherwood ( 5,198 ) and rushcliffe ( 8,010 ) .
councillor steve battlemuch , who represents wollaton , said : `` when you have got a candidate in place you have got some name recognition .
`` you can go out and say that this person is challenging for the seat . ''
the smallest majority in nottinghamshire is labour-held ashfield , won by gloria de piero by 441 votes from the conservatives .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man endures seven months of pain after shrovetide football accident
text: a 69-year-old man who dislocated his shoulder at the start of this year 's ashbourne royal shrovetide football has called on organisers to increase the number of stewards at future events .
david phillips , from dove holes , is due to have surgery on the shoulder today after seven months of pain since the annual event in february .
he told bbc radio derby : `` half a second into the game and - bang - i was on the car park ground .
`` i did n't see them coming .
some of the lads put their arms down to reach me to pull me up but they could n't reach so i had to save myself .
`` as i was lying on the ground , i thought 'this is it , then - you 're staring at death here ' . ''
the shrovetide committee said it did not want to comment .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cricket : hales set for ashes recall ?
text: nottinghamshire batsman alex hales has been included in the final bbc sport readers squad for this winter 's ashes series .
hales , 28 , who played the last of his 11 tests in 2016 , was selected by 60 % of voters for the 17-man squad .
unsurprisingly , hales ' county colleague stuart broad was by 94 % of you .
the actual ashes squad is named at 10:00 tomorrow .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : retiring mep reflects on her time in brussels
text: east midlands mep glenis wilmott has given her final speech as labour 's leader in the european parliament to her party 's conference in brighton .
ms willmott , who has represented the region as an mep since 2009 , is retiring next month .
her speech touched upon what she thought the party had achieved in europe , including better workers rights , investment in industrial communities and helping to clean up the nation 's beaches .
the conservative party conference starts on sunday in manchester .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: market square bus crash scene cleared
text: emergency services have been dealing with the crash since 07:40 .
lorrys and bus involved in market sq rtc have been moved .
traffic can flow through low row w now .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: winnall set for rams starting line-up
text: sam winnall is in line to make his first start for derby county in tonight 's championship match at brentford .
the rams have suffered heavy defeats in their previous two away matches and manager gary rowett says the griffin park will provide `` an opportunity for some players to come into the team '' .
author: John Collins
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: 'fire alarms not switched on ' at arson-hit flats
text: fire alarms in communal areas in a block of flats in leicester that has been the subject of seven arson attacks since june are not switched on , it has been revealed .
leicestershire fire and rescue said it believes all seven fires , including the latest on friday , were started deliberately .
roshi modi , who lives in the flats , told bbc radio leicester : `` it is absolutely petrifying .
`` i was treated for smoke inhalation .
you read about this , see it on tv , but it is really , really painful . ''
the fire service confirmed there is no legal requirement for any alarms to be activated in communal areas , as the building operates a `` stay put '' policy .
building managers , loughborough-based hunter grey , said that it was doing all it could to keep residents safe .
author: BBC Radio Leicester

documents.title: students urged to tone down city centre partying
text: students in nottingham are being reminded to think about their neighbours after a number of parties were shut down in the canning circus area this weekend .
community protection officers intervened to halt six parties and handed out more than 25 community protection notices between friday and sunday .
nottinghamshire police has been working with the city council to monitor the issue .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : the apprentice is back - with two east mids hopefuls
text: the apprentice returns to our screens in eight days and this year 's series features two east midlands candidates .
sarah jayne clark , from derbyshire , runs a clothing company and describes herself as `` the definition of a girl boss '' .
meanwhile , nottinghamshire 's elizabeth mckenna is the owner of a florist chain and says she 's a `` slightly bonkers country girl '' .
you can catch a glimpse of both in the video below .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: forest set to lose lester to managerial role
text: nottingham post 's forest reporter paul taylor tweets
will be a big blow for # nffc to lose jack lester .
but understandable that he 'd want to take first step into management at chesterfield .
a good fit for him at his former club .
still details to work out , but good luck to him if it is all confirmed .
bright young coach .
think it will effect the production of academy players paul ?
they still have very good people there gary brazil and gareth holmes being two .
hopefully we keep the bright young players coming through !
it will be a huge blow for them , i 've wathced him mentor and coach the lads for a few seasons now , great coach and i wish @ twitterid well
who 's going to teach our forwards to throw themselves to the ground in the penalty area now ?
only joking !
good luck jack
on the plus side , hopefully another pipeline for our youngsters to get experience .
good luck to him .
massive player for them and hope he does well
good luck to him be nice to see him come back at some stage i 've seen him at first hand with the youngsters at the academy
good luck jack
next forest manager
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bakewell show to take break after 2017 mudbath
text: next year 's bakewell show has been cancelled after this year 's event was blighted by muddy conditions and heavy rain .
organisers of the agricultural show said they wanted to rest the ground for a year and were going to rethink the event in the light of falling visitor numbers .
joint director ian else said : `` we want to ensure that the show meets people 's needs .
`` a year off in 2018 will not only give the ground time to recover from use in hostile weather conditions but will also give us time to reconsider the show 's content . ''
the 2019 event will mark the show 's 200th anniversary .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man stabbed in new whittington
text: a man is in hospital after being stabbed several times in new whittington .
police said the 28-year-old was attacked by two men in bamford street at about 14:25 on sunday .
they 've appealed for any witnesses to get in touch .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: football : lester set to leave forest for spireites return
text: i understand that chesterfield are close to agreeing a compensation package with nottingham forest for the release of academy coach jack lester .
forest 's owners have still to sign off on the move for lester but that 's expected to be a formality .
the 41-year-old is expected to become the spireites ' new manager after the club sacked gary caldwell earlier this month .
author: Andy Giddings
Sports Editor, BBC Sheffield

documents.title: watch : asbestos victim 's family release death bed interview
text: a video of a former rail worker from derby who died from prolonged exposure to asbestos has been released to encourage other potential victims to bid for compensation .
eddie jowett died in june from asbestosis , an incurable lung disease , after being exposed to the material during the 1950s and 1960s .
he was 75 .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: flu jab 'works better for people in good mood , ' study finds
text: being in a good mood when you get your flu jab could boost its effectiveness , according to research from the university of nottingham .
the institute looked at the moods , physical activity , diet and sleep of a group of 138 older people who were due to have their flu jab in 2014-15 .
measurements were taken three times a week over six weeks .
they examined how well the jab was working by measuring the amount of influenza antibody in the blood at four weeks and 16 weeks after the jab .
they saw a link between having a positive mood , how well the jab seemed to work and higher levels of antibody , according to the study in the journal brain , behaviour and immunity .
author: Press Association

documents.title: trams backed up after nottingham city centre bus smash
text: a twitter user has shared this photo of trams in nottingham backed up following this morning 's crash near market square involving a bus and two lorries .
nottingham city transport says most buses in the city have also been affected by the disruption .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: lorry driver injured in market square crash
text: police say a lorry driver has been taken to hospital with serious leg injuries after the crash in nottingham 's market square this morning .
a cordon has been put up following the crash , which involved a bus and two lorries in long row at about 07:40 .
there are delays to tram and bus services and drivers have been advised to avoid the area .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: driver escapes massive a38 crash with minor injuries
text: a lucky driver managed to avoid serious injury despite wrecking his car in a crash on the a38 near mickleover last night .
police said it happened on the exit slip road to the a516 from the northbound carriageway at about 20:00 .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rugby : ben youngs warns of possible strike action
text: ben youngs has become the latest big name to warn of strike action if players are pushed beyond their capacity to play .
leicester tigers scrum-half youngs , follows the likes of billy vunipola and joe marler in questioning the demands of modern rugby .
he said : `` if it comes to that [ strike action ] , guys will stand up for what they feel is right to protect themselves .
`` guys have been outspoken about it but that 's because they care about the length of their career .
`` they do n't want it four years shorter .
they want to be able to finish on their terms - they know their bodies . ''
author: Press Association

documents.title: watch : east midlands weather outlook
text: it has been a foggy start to the day for many - but what does the rest of tuesday have in store ?
alex hamilton has the details
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: person taken to hospital after market square crash
text: it 's thought at least one person was taken away in an ambulance following the crash in market square , involving a bus , lorry and van .
at least 10 bus services have had to be diverted and there are delays on trams in the area .
there are delays of approx .
20+mins on green 5 , 6 , 7 , 8 , 9 , 10/c/x , and 11 as well as orange 34 , 35 , 36 due to an rtc in the city .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: retail guru donates £ 5m to university
text: the university of leicester is set to receive its largest-ever philanthropic gift from a donor .
retail guru george davies , the man who brought next , george at asda and per una for marks & spencer to the high street , will be handing over £ 5m .
the money will be used in conjunction with the the university hospitals of leicester nhs trust for research into vascular disease and limb amputation .
mr davies ' donation will also help fund a vascular limb salvage clinic at glenfield hospital , which it is hoped will prevent more patients from having to be amputated .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: city centre crash causes delays
text: a crash involving a nottingham city transport bus and a lorry near nottingham 's market square has led to major delays on the city 's tram network .
net said despite the disruption , trams are still running to all destinations .
buses are also being diverted .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : rush hour latest
text: there does n't seem to be any major problems affecting roads in the east midlands right now .
highways england is reporting delays on the a52 westbound at its junction with the a5111 and the slip road to the m1 at junction 5 .
there is also congestion further along on the a52 westbound between the a606 and a60 junctions .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to tuesday across the east midlands .
gavin bevis and i will be here until later with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live
